charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(B)CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE NARCOTICS did conspire and possess with intent to distribute 500 grams or more of cocaine a schedule II controlled substance (1)

21:841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(B)CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE NARCOTICS did possess with intent to distribute 500 grams or more of cocaine a schedule II controlled substance and did aid and abet each other (2)

21:841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(B)CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE NARCOTICS did conspire and possess with intent to distribute 500 grams or more of cocaine a schedule II controlled substance (1)

21:841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(B)CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE NARCOTICS did possess with intent to distribute 500 grams or more of cocaine a schedule II controlled substance and did aid and abet each other (2)
